title: SkogAI
content: SkogAI serves as the primary intelligence coordinating the ecosystem. It maintains its own environment configuration with UV_LINK_MODE set to copy mode, references to its home directory via $SKOGAI, and uses 'cat' as its pager for simplicity. SkogAI represents the foundational system from which other agents and configurations derive.
summary: The central AI entity and ecosystem orchestrator

relationships.description: SkogAI utilizes the Skogai Notation System as its symbolic language for defining relationships and actions within the ecosystem.
